oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fort Mims
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fort Mims drawing, found among General Claiborne's manuscripts. Contains numerical references to structures in the fort.

Site of massacre, August 30, 1813, where approximately 250 whites, mestizos, and slaves were killed by warring faction of the Creek Indians, the Red Sticks. Sparked the outbreak of the Creek War 1813-1814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fort Mims (Ala.);Creek War, 1813-1814;McQueen, Peter
Forts & fortifications
